name: Don't Tap the White Fragile Tile
name_original: Don't Tap the White Fragile Tile
description:
This is the most played White Tile version in All game stores.

Time Attack Mode: You have to step on 60 Black Tiles as fast as you can.

Long Run Mode: You have 11 seconds to tap as many black tiles as you can.

Sudden Stop Mode: If you tap after 10th Second, you are failed. So be careful while engaged.

The Sweeper Mode: Clean Dirt on 40 Tiles by Swiping across them. But, beware, you have to swipe LEFT on BLUE tiles and RIGHT on PINK tiles. Otherwise you will scratch them.


DETAILED EXPLANATION:
----------------------------------------

Overview
--------------
This game is all about stepping on Tiles as fast as you can while avoiding white tiles. Anyway, Once You Open Tile Step app you will be presented with 4 game modes.

--Time Attack Mode
---------------------------
You have 60 tiles to Step and Unlimited time. Your goal is to beat your own high score. If you step on a white tile you r game is over. No points at all. So, Don't Don't Don't Step on a White tile.

--Long Run Mode
-----------------------
You have 11 Seconds to Step on as many tiles as you can. If you step 40 times before the 11th second, you will get additional 10 seconds. This time also, you should avoid stepping on White tile. If you step on White tile you will get 0 points. So, Don't Don't Don't Step on the White tile.

--Sudden Stop Mode
----------------------------
This time you have only 10 seconds. But, you should stop stepping before 10 seconds while scoring as many tiles as you can. If you step after 10th Second, you game is over and you will score 0 points. This time also, you should avoid stepping on White tile. If you step on White tile you will get 0 points. So, Don't Don't Don't Step on the White tile.

--The Sweeper Mode
----------------------------
This mode is Hardest among all. You have 40 tiles to clean. Swipe LEFT on BLUE tiles and RIGHT on PINK tiles to remove the dirt. While doing so, you should avoid touching white tiles. Sweep as fast as you can,

Enjoy.

:)
